channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mr. Pawsitively Perfect
channel.desc: An aspiring designer has her favourite foster dog adopted by a down-on-his-luck furniture maker, so she sets out to see if he will take good care of the pooch.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Attraction Test
channel.desc: After being called out during the launch of her landmark study on love, an acclaimed professor is forced to take her own dating test with the man who criticised it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love Hacks
channel.desc: Relationship coach Sam believes she can fix any romance and she's creating a podcast to prove it. But then producer Josh poses some unexpected hurdles.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Marry Go Round
channel.desc: Abby has a great job, a man she wants to marry and she's moving to Paris. Life is great, until she discovers that her divorce from high-school sweetheart Luke isn't exactly official.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Our Take On Love
channel.desc: When fashion designer Isabella and filmmaker Blake work together to capture a love story from the past, they start to find romance in their present too.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sweeter Than Chocolate
channel.desc: A TV reporter investigates when she hears whisperings of a rumour that a local chocolatier has discovered the secret recipe to finding true love.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love In Whitbrooke
channel.desc: A project manager must choose between nurturing a blooming romance in her small hometown in the USA and moving to London to pursue her dream job.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Finding Love In Saint Lucia
channel.desc: In the jungles of Saint Lucia, an ornithologist and journalist partner up to save an endangered species of bird. As both fall in love with nature, they begin to fall for each other.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Scottish Love Scheme
channel.desc: Lily travels to Scotland and meets Logan, a childhood family friend, where their mothers are hatching a plan to get them together, once and for all. Steamy romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Pumpkin Everything
channel.desc: An up-and-coming novelist must confront an old flame from her past when she returns to her hometown to look after her stubborn grandfather and his pumpkin-themed store.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Falling Together
channel.desc: In her attempts to bring her feuding neighbours together, Natalie finds an unexpected ally in someone who wants to stay out of the battle altogether.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mountain Rescue Romance
channel.desc: The iciest of hearts melt when a preppy avalanche expert and a no-nonsense rescue ranger are stationed at the same mountain park.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Heartstrings Attached
channel.desc: With the promise of an inheritance from her grandfather spurring her, Emma promises to tutor a gifted violinist, unaware her grandfather is playing matchmaker from the grave.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Making Waves
channel.desc: When a music label executive goes to a festival on the Outer Banks to check out an elusive new band, she discovers that the group is fronted by her childhood sweetheart.
